entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
